item.title: Air China and Kunming Airlines have initiated a codeshare agreement
item.description: Source: Air China. The image shows representatives from Air China and Kunming Airlines at a signing ceremony for a codeshare agreement on September 3. Air China and Kunming Airlines launched a codeshare partnership on September 15, 2014. This agreement allows the airlines to link their respective networks through the city of Kunming. Air China will place its “CA” code on 26 Kunming Airlines routes, encompassing nearly 500 weekly flights. This expands Air China’s reach to various cities within Yunnan province and its neighboring areas.

item.title: Sofitel Kunming provides convenient access to the city center
item.description: Sofitel, the luxury hotel brand under AccorHotels, has launched its newest property, Sofitel Kunming. Located in the city center, it’s the only international luxury hotel in Kunming. Situated in Kunming’s central business district, the 400-room hotel spans the 27th to 52nd floors. It showcases a blend of French elegance and art de vivre with touches of Yunnan’s vibrant ethnic cultures and customs. “The debut of Sofitel Kunming signifies a period of rapid growth for AccorHotels in China, as we continue to solidify our dedication to delivering world-renowned, refined French hospitality to discerning Chinese travelers,” shared Paul Richardson, Chief Operating Officer of AccorHotels Greater China.
